PERSONA:
This 35 to 44-year-old male, born in the United States and residing in California, has limited formal education, with less than a 9th-grade level. He is a non-veteran and speaks English well. As the householder, he may be the primary breadwinner of his household. His lower education level may limit his job prospects and income, potentially placing him in a lower-income bracket. 

Possible economic concerns for this individual might include:

Possible viewpoints or priorities for this demographic might include:
